title: Impact of corporate earnings reports on L3Harris Technologies Inc stock's price movements

content.text: In May 2021, L3Harris Technologies Inc reported its Q1 2021 earnings. The company had a strong performance, with revenue of $4.6 billion, beating analysts' expectations. Additionally, the company raised its full-year revenue guidance. As a result, the stock price increased by 3% in the days following the earnings report.

In February 2021, L3Harris Technologies Inc released its Q4 2020 earnings. The company reported revenue of $4.7 billion, which was slightly lower than analysts' estimates. However, the earnings per share exceeded expectations. Despite the mixed results, the stock price experienced a minor decline of 1% after the earnings report.

In October 2020, L3Harris Technologies Inc announced its Q3 2020 earnings. The company reported revenue of $4.5 billion, which was in line with analysts' forecasts. However, the earnings per share fell short of expectations. Consequently, the stock price dropped by 4% after the earnings report.

In August 2020, L3Harris Technologies Inc released its Q2 2020 earnings. The company reported revenue of $4.6 billion, surpassing analysts' expectations. Moreover, the company raised its full-year revenue guidance. As a result, the stock price surged by 6% following the earnings report.

In May 2020, L3Harris Technologies Inc reported its Q1 2020 earnings. The company's revenue of $4.6 billion exceeded analysts' estimates. Additionally, the company reaffirmed its full-year guidance. Consequently, the stock price increased by 2% in the days following the earnings report.

In February 2020, L3Harris Technologies Inc released its Q4 2019 earnings. The company reported revenue of $4.8 billion, surpassing analysts' expectations. Moreover, the earnings per share also exceeded estimates. As a result, the stock price experienced a significant jump of 8% after the earnings report.

In October 2019, L3Harris Technologies Inc announced its Q3 2019 earnings. The company reported revenue of $4.4 billion, which was slightly lower than analysts' estimates. However, the earnings per share were above expectations. Despite the mixed results, the stock price remained relatively stable with no significant movement after the earnings report.

news.headline: L3Harris to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences
news.summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., February 07, 2024--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) Chair and CEO Christopher E. Kubasik and Chief Financial Officer Ken Bedingfield will attend Citi’s Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference on Feb. 20 in Miami. Kubasik and Bedingfield are also scheduled to present at the Barclays Industrial Select Conference at 8:30 a.m. ET, Feb. 21, also in Miami. The Barclays presentation will stream live on the L3Harris website with a recording available following the event.
